1.0.name: wordpress/season-greetings
1.0.description:
Season Greetings for your blog, For all occassions and seasons, festivals. (Indian Festivals, International Festiavls)

You can configure the number of icons/images and limit the plugin to specific posts or pages. If you enter something into the URI field you will only see snow if the URI of your page matches the string.

For live demo pls visit Live Demo on my blog.
